on reading compounds: 熾烈【シレツ】fierce (fight, competition, etc.), severe, hot, hard, bitter, keen, cutthroat
熾盛【シジョウ】vigor (like leaping flames), liveliness
kun reading compounds: 熾る【おこる】to catch fire (of charcoal), to start burning, to burn away, to burn merrily
熾す【おこす】to build (a fire), to make, to start, to light
